Package model

Class PlayerAccount

java.lang.Object
model.PlayerAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlayerAccount extends Object implements Serializable
PlayerAccount stores information for the player's username, password, guesses made, previous game wins, and save information for current games to be accesses if player is logged out.
Since:
April 15, 2023
See Also:
